Script Index

break/source.sh

This module is ideal when you can't manage your hackers: let the GOD BASH do it.

Synopsis

Break management module

function break_init()

Parameters:

  • None

Description

Declares module configuration variable names.

  • interval: int seconds required between breaks

function break_defaults_setter()

Parameters:

  • None

Description

Sets the default break interval to 7200 and conf path to ~/.break

function break_save()

Parameters:

  • None

Description

Save your break configuration

function break_load()

Parameters:

  • None

Description

Load your break configuration

function break_request()

Parameters:

  • None

Description

Is your break granted?

function break_do()

Parameters:

  • None

Description

Updates the previous break timestamp and saves for anti-cheat security.
